title: Ryder Cup fans Team USA Europe
headline: The Best Dressed and Craziest Fans at The Ryder Cup
description: The Ryder Cup brings fans from all over the world in support of their favorite golfers, and it's no secret who many of these fans are rooting for. See the best dressed fans supporting Team USA and Team Europe.
